summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Dept., authorizing preconstruction and construction activities for the Beacon Ave. South Resurfacing Project; authorizing the hiring of consultants and the awarding of contracts; making a reduction in a previous appropriation for the Arterial Concrete Street Rehabilitation Program and reappropriating those funds; increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1986 Budget of the Seattle Engr. Dept., and making appropriations from the Engineering Operating and Cumulative Reserve Funds therefor.
